unnormalised: Hey guys, any update on Bumrah's injury? Heard he twisted his ankle during the Mohali match. Dr. Sharma said it's not too serious, but will he be fit for the next R.R. clash? Also, what about Deepak Chahar's hamstring? Last I heard, he was rehabbing at the NCA. The new physiotherapy centre there is huge, almost 2000 sq ft! Hopefully, both are back soon, we need them for the upcoming series. Rs. 50 says they'll be back stronger!
normalised: Hey guys, any update on Bumrah's injury? Heard he twisted his ankle during the Mohali match. Doctor Sharma said it's not too serious, but will he be fit for the next R R clash? Also, what about Deepak Chahar's hamstring? Last I heard, he was rehabbing at the N C A. The new physiotherapy centre there is huge, almost two thousand square feet! Hopefully, both are back soon, we need them for the upcoming series. rupees fifty says they'll be back stronger!
